short_summary: Purchase office furniture for delivery and installation in Gatineau, Quebec.
description: The solicitation covers a requirement amongst the PSIB Stream, containing products from categories 1, 2, and 5, and includes products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title
EN439-232193 Phase 1A.4 – Workspaces, CAT 1-2-5 PSIB

2

May 22, 2023

None

## Tender Description
This solicitation covers a requirement for office furniture under the PSIB Stream, product categories 1-2-5, with deliveries and installations taking place in Gatineau, Quebec between October 30, 2023 and December 30, 2023. This requirement does not include any security-related products. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the provision of office furniture, including design, supply, delivery, and installation services. The successful bidder will be required to meet the program’s standards and requirements. The tender is open to all qualified suppliers. The tender closing date is May 16, 2023 at 2:00
